question:
Arrange the following Viceroys according to the chronological order of their appointment
1. Lord Lansdowne
2. Lord Elgin II
3. Lord Ripon
4. Lord Dufferin
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Chronological order of the Viceroys- Lord Ripon (1880-84), Lord Dufferin (1884-88), Lord Lansdowne (1888-94), Lord Elgin II (1894-99)
